alert.note: Alert for Benton; St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton and northern St. Clair Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Deepwater to 6 miles north of Schell City. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Truman State Park, Truman Lake, Warsaw, Lincoln, Appleton City, Cole Camp, Osceola, Lowry City, Palo Pinto, Lakeview Heights, Crockerville, Harper, Iconium, Racket, Edmonson, Johnson City, Monegaw Springs and Whitakerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
